text: "Welcome to the Jungle" is a song by the American rock band Guns N' Roses. It featured on their debut album Appetite for Destruction and went to number 7 in the United States and number 6 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== All songs credited to Guns N' Roses except where noted == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Welcome to the Jungle
